lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The important implication of the Maekawa report is that it is finally looking to let Japanese enjoy the fruits of their labour," said Philip Caldwell, Senior Managing Director of Shearson Lehman Brothers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Related to this matter of (trade) imbalance, the point that I found to be of great cause for alarm during this trip to Europe was the excessive degree of hope placed by the Europeans in the results of the Maekawa report," he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It recommended that to stop friction due to its large trade surpluses, Japan must "make a historical transformation in its traditional policies on economic management and the nation's lifestyle.
